title: BEAUTIFUL STUDIO AVAILABLE NOW TO SEE!
posting_body: ['GAS COMPANY LOFTS', '810 S Flower St.', 'Los Angeles, CA 90017', 'show contact info', 'https://essexapts.info/Gas-Company-Lofts', 'Unit: 1009', 'Square Ft: 677 sq ft', 'Available: Now', 'Rent: $2,189* w/12 month lease', 'Beautiful historic loft with stainless steel appliances, central A/C, huge windows, on-site laundry facility, and AMAZING rooftop amenities!', 'What an opportunity to live grand in this spacious studio loft!', "Don't stall on this one- Call", 'show contact info', 'to schedule your virtual or self-guided tour!', '30-Day Satisfaction Guarantee:', 'We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee with any leased apartment.', 'If you’re not 100% satisfied with your new home, we’ll help you transfer to a comparable home within the same community or you can choose to terminate your lease.*', 'Offer valid on select apartments for new applicants with approved credit.', 'Offer is subject to availability at select Essex communities and move-in date requirements apply.', 'Contact the leasing office for details.', '*', 'Some restrictions apply.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity.', 'Nearby: Fashion District, Little Tokyo, South Park, Financial District, Bunker Hill, Jewelry District, Arts District, Civic Center, Chinatown, Central Industrial District, Central City East, Historic Core, DTLA, Downtown, Los Angeles', '*Restrictions apply.', 'Offer valid on select apartments for new applicants with approved credit.', 'Offer is subject to availability at select communities and move-in date requirements apply.', 'Pricing and specials are subject to change.']
